thread.title: Decent place with good location
thread.title_full: Decent place with good location - Review of Hotel de la Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Erik V
title: Decent place with good location
text:
This is an efficient, clean, and practical option for travellers wanting to stay walking distance to the Eiffel Tower. Stayed for 2 nights with no problems. Rooms are on the small side, but clean. Full private bathroom in each room. There was a breakfast option to purchase, but we skipped that, since there are plenty of places nearby to get coffee and pastries in the morning. The Eiffel Tower is about a 10 minute walk from the hotel. They contract with a car service to the airport, which was useful (cost is 18-20â‚¬ per person).
We would stay here again!
